content:
How does one build clippy using their own copy of rustc? I tried what was mentioned here: https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/122651-general/topic/building.20clippy

and got the same error as Dhruv.

I think I have a solution for why the PR is breaking here but don't have a way to locally test them
@Aman Arora answered in the other thread
